text: @piersmorgan @ChrisGiles_ Or the true figures could be the opposite an a massive chunk of the deaths are not even from covid but, as rumours have it, been put down as this 🤷‍♂️. Maybe have a nosey into that side of it #COVID19 #conspiracy #LockdownEnd
